institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 10 (Change in business plan)
contents: Article 10 (Change of business plan) ① If the business group wishes to change any of the following matters among the business plan confirmed in accordance with Article 9, it must submit a change request to the chairman at least 30 days prior to the scheduled change date., 1. Training Matters related to the establishment and abolition of courses, etc., 2. Matters related to changes in support funds, such as changes in investment plans for training facilities and equipment, 3. Matters related to changes in business goals, such as the number of people conducting training, ② The business group shall provide information on matters that do not fall under each item of paragraph 1. If changes are made, the Corporation must be notified of the changes by the date of change to the business plan.
